responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain backend systems and APIs using Scala and related technologies
Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to integrate AI models into the backend infrastructure
Optimize and scale backend services to handle large volumes of data and ensure high performance
Implement data storage and retrieval mechanisms, ensuring data integrity and security
Work closely with frontend developers to define and implement APIs that meet the requirements of the user interface
Collaborate with SREs to deploy and monitor backend services in a cloud environment
Conduct code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and ensure adherence to coding standards
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements to enhance the backend infrastructure
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on backend development, collaboration with data scientists and machine learning engineers, and optimizing backend services. There is no mention of tasks related to training or fine-tuning language models, which is a specialized task typically handled by machine learning engineers or data scientists. Therefore, this activity is not directly relevant to the job responsibilities.

Optimize and scale backend services to handle large volumes of data and ensure high performance
Implement data storage and retrieval mechanisms, ensuring data integrity and security
Work closely with frontend developers to define and implement APIs that meet the requirements of the user interface
Collaborate with SREs to deploy and monitor backend services in a cloud environment
Conduct code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and ensure adherence to coding standards
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements to enhance the backend infrastructure
analysis: Qualitative data analysis involves synthesizing user feedback and identifying themes, which is more relevant to UX research. The job responsibilities emphasize backend development, data handling, and collaboration with technical teams, without any mention of analyzing qualitative user data.
